column4: great quality.  Every time I've been to Chicago I come down here for some personal pans.  The cheese is fresh and the crust is buttery and crispy with that distinct after taste.  Yet
column6: there is NO TRASHY feeling at the end of the meal like you'd get at Pizza Hut or most other pizza joints.  This is tasty
column8: made without so much of that commonly found grease on other crusts out there.
